ComicInfo.Title: The Wonder of the Ages!!! Magnetor!; Shangri-La; They Met on Mars!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:34:40. [CVDB177445] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:48:30. [Issue ID 96178]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Kirby,Bill Everett,Steve Ditko,Dick Ayers,Jack Kirby,Bill Everett,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Inker: Dick Ayers,Bill Everett,Steve Ditko,Jack Kirby,Dick Ayers,Bill Everett,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Letterer: Sam Rosen,Artie Simek,Joe Rosen,Sam Rosen,Artie Simek,Joe Rosen
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wonder of the Ages!!! Magnetor!: A strong but dim man is exploited for profit by a con man and then abandoned, unable to find work except in a freak show. His unusual size is thought to make him the perfect passenger for an experimental space flight, but a strange cloud gives him magnetic powers. Angry at his previous humiliation, he attacks society and runs amok until a special rocket is created to allow him to leave Earth and find somewhere where he can fit in.
Shangri-La: A man makes it back from Shangri-La only to be informed that the man he spoke with, whom he takes to be mad, actually left for the valley four hundred years ago.
They Met on Mars!: Two unrecognizable beings land on Mars and fight. One of them destroys the other's ship and escapes, with the two never knowing that they were both human space travelers: one from the United States, one from the Soviet Union.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
